remarks: Two distinct lines intersect in at most one point.  Theorem 6.21 of [Schwabhauser] p. 46.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lineintmo $p |- ( ( A e. LinesEE /\ B e. LinesEE /\ A =/= B ) -> E* x ( x e. A /\ x e. B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
